
t=int(raw_input())

while(t>0):
    t-=1
    n=input()
    arrival=[int(i) for i in raw_input().split()]
    departure=[int(i) for i in raw_input().split()]
    h=0
    ans=0
    count=0
    while(h<1005):
        for i in range(n):
            if(h==arrival[i]):
                count+=1
                ans=max(ans,count)
            if(h==departure[i]):
                count-=1
        h+=1
    print ans
